alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Lower Columbia Basin of Washington; Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 04 at 2:33PM PDT until November 05 at 7:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon, Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon and North Central Oregon. In Washington, Lower Columbia Basin of Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington and Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Lower Columbia Basin of Washington; Northwest Blue Mountains
